txt.en: Dull axes can be found at Trader's Wharf.\n\nYou should sharpen axes with the whetstones you have collected.
Mal Knapweed can be found at Trader's Wharf.\n\nYou should talk to Mal Knapweed.
'Those axes look mighty sharp. Harvesting lumber is about to get a might easier! Thank you for assisting the League, [placeholder].'
An effort to harvest lumber from the Wildwood is on hold until the League's axes are properly sharp.

'The League prides itself on the tools we wield. I'm sorry to say that some of the axes around here at Trader's Wharf have seen better days! If you'd like to assist us, I think there is something for you to do.\n\n'There might be some whetstones nearby. They are indeed very good when used for sharpening axes and knives. Would you find some for us, then give these axes a good sharpen? The League will be grateful for your efforts.'
Whetstones can be found in the Wildwood.\n\nYou should find and collect whetstones for the League of the Axe.
